metadata.title: Subject Tutoring & Exam Preparation
metadata.description: From entrance exams to university prep, our expert tutors provide personalised instruction across all subjects and educational stages.

educationLevels.label: Primary School
educationLevels.description: The primary curriculum is the scaffolding upon which secondary success plays out; we're passionate about plugging gaps and getting it right.

educationLevels.label: Secondary School
educationLevels.description: One-to-one tutoring for KS3, GCSE, A-Level and IB, delivered by experienced subject specialists and examiners.

educationLevels.label: Entrance Exams
educationLevels.description: Specialised preparation for competitive entrance examinations across all age groups.

educationLevels.label: University Applications & Specialist Tests
educationLevels.description: Expert academic support for undergraduates and postgraduates, including essay coaching, dissertations, and subject-specific tutoring.

educationLevels.label: Online Homeschooling
educationLevels.description: Comprehensive one-to-one homeschooling for families seeking both academic structure and flexibility.

educationLevels.label: SEN Support & Neurodiverse Learning
educationLevels.description: Our Founder Elizabeth's own neurodiversity (dyspraxia) means she's especially passionate about equipping students with gamechanging SEN support.

educationLevels.label: London In-Person Tutoring
educationLevels.description: In-person tutoring typically available across Zones 1â€“5, depending on student location and tutor availability.
